title: Don't click on the ward skin chooser guys, its bugged
body:
https://imgur.com/BufcSbU

Just as he told me too, fuck

replies.body:
As a heads up - we've been tracking this issue in this thread: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/sUEQWzGs-do-not-click-the-new-ward-skin

We've disabled the in-queue Ward Skin selection in Oceania due to this problem - we've identified the cause of the problem and are currently working on getting a fix rolled out [- we'll keep you updated when there's more information!](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce)
